name: Gill Light
description:
Made during the Global Game Jam 2022. The theme was "Duality"

Use key "R" to reload your battery

there are tons of bugs. I was running out of time so I couldn't have the time to fix them. The game will be developed further as now the jam is over. Please consider this version as a demo of what we are trying to create.

Thanks to my artist and level designer, Rıfatcan Yüksel and Cem Durdu
